strIntroduction: How can you travel abroad without internet? There's no need to fill in forms for rental! With this 7-day 3GB SIM card, you can not only check in and upload photos to facebook, but having no fear of losing the way!
strTitle: Korea 7-day SIM Card (3GB), Taiwan Shipping Only

strIntroduction: The most convenient pick-up service between Gimpo Airport and hotels in Seoul. It's open 24/7!

strIntroduction: To know more about Korean culture from ancient to today, you can't miss this tour!
strTitle: Korean Heritage Tour: Palaces and Villages of Seoul Including Gyeongbokgung Palace

strIntroduction: A trip to the city's busiest marketplaces is a great way to soak up vibrant spirit of Seoul. Besides, it's necessary to shop for a variety of items such as herbal medicine, fresh fruit, textiles and semi-precious stones.
strTitle: Traditional Open Market Tour

strIntroduction: If you appreciate contemporary art, you can't miss the chance to visit Leeum and the Gana Art Gallery!

strIntroduction: The one and only all-female percussion group in the world! Bursting with unique rhythmical styling and emotional involvement, DRUM CAT's superb skills in high-speed drumming and unique combination of various sounds are a treat for both the eyes and ears!

strIntroduction: Settle at a scenic spot by the Han River to enjoy one of Korea’s most popular snacks, referred to as ‘chimac,’ you’ll eat like a local as you savor a snack alongside city dwellers leaving the worries of the day behind.

strIntroduction: 初學者首選行程，冬季來韓國旅遊的最佳體驗！提供所有裝備與初學者教學課程，今年冬天就來首爾滑雪吧
strTitle: Ski Tour in Seoul

strIntroduction: ILSAN Aqua Planet, the very first aquarium combining aquarium and zoo within an arena, is a 4,300 ton new-concept aquarium featuring both aquatic animal, dolphins and terrestrial animal, tigers. Located near by the transportation hub, ILSAN is surely one of the recommended place for you to visit!
strTitle: ILSAN Aqua Planet Ticket

strIntroduction: Jeju Aqua Planet is the biggest aquarium in Asia, with more than 50,000 pieces of different marine creatures! Besides, it equips with Ocean Arena and Marine Science museum. Both adults and children can have a great time here!
strTitle: Jeju Aqua Planet Ticket

strIntroduction: No matter how old we are, we can all return back to our childhood in ToyKino! You can both soak in the world of American characters and the world of Korean and Japanese traditional figurines!
strTitle: Other Great Spots to Go in Seoul: ToyKino Museum

strIntroduction: The pick-up service between Kimhae International Airport and Busan City will not only save your time but keep money in your pocket! Still wondering how to transport between Busan City and the airport? A product with high CP value is your best choice!
strTitle: Gimhae International Airport－Busan City pick-up service

strIntroduction: Visit the royal palace Gyeongbokgung of Joseon dynasty, N Seoul Tower, Namsan Hanok Village, Tong-in Traditional Market and so much more during our Seoul City Tour.
strTitle: 【Past and Modern】Seoul City Tour

strIntroduction: As known as the very first theme parks that can arouse resonance among people, Poopoo Land offers you a totally different but eye-opening experience. You can not only enjoy some interesting facilities, such as poopoo slide and get familiar with your poop, but try some delicious poop-shape cake over here!
strTitle: Poo Poo Land in Seoul

strIntroduction: Have you ever imagined yourself as the character of "The Fast and the Furious"? Now, it's time to fulfill your dream in Jeju!
strTitle: Jeju ATV Experience

strIntroduction: 63 City Building in Yeouido stands 264 meters above sea level and is considered as one of Seoul’s well known landmarks. The 60th floor of 63 City Building has been newly remodeled into an art museum, offering a place for art exhibitions, magic shows, and various cultural experiences. Besides the mentioned activities, you can also spend time on the beautiful scenery of the Hangang River right here!
strTitle: Seoul 63 CITY - Sky Art Museum tickets

strIntroduction: E-World, the amusement park situated around subway station is where Korean drama, "Hyde, Jekyll, Me" was filmed! Although used to be known as an industry city, Daegu has blended heavy industrial urban scenes with its exclusive scenery. Only 1.5 hours needed from Seoul to Daegu! Stop hesitating! Let's go to Daegu!
strTitle: E-World Amusement Park & 83 Tower in Daegu

strIntroduction: Meet K-POP stars right before your eyes and travel back in time with holographic concerts. Come and go on a date with your favorite star or become a K-pop star yourself in a virtual reality space.

strIntroduction: Enjoy professional pedicure treatment on yacht in Jeju Island! Not only release the stress but make your feet beautiful, it's a good way to gain energy for your trip!

strIntroduction: Gain a deeper insight into Korean history and culture on this tour in Seoul with a friendly, knowledgeable local guide. Explore Gyeongbokgung Palace, visit a traditional Buddhist temple, discover Korea’s folk culture at a museum, and learn interesting facts about Korea’s politics at an exhibition center. You’ll also visit the National Ginseng Outlet to learn the secrets of this important plant.

strIntroduction: Get an in-depth look at Korean history, culture and religion on this 3-day tour of Gyeongju and Busan!

strIntroduction: Enjoy the night sight of N Seoul Tower and Han River Cruise and leave some unforgettable memory of Korea!

strIntroduction: Through the art of storytelling you will learn about Korea's history during the Age of Imperialism.

strIntroduction: Discover the history, culture and food of Seoul on a walking tour of this bustling metropolis. Journey back to the past and visit Buddhist temples, historic landmarks, art markets and traditional tea shops. Finish your tour savoring mouthwatering Korean delicacies.

strIntroduction: Summertime only! Besides paying a visit to Sanmeoru Farm to become more familiar with the process of producing red wine, we'll also show you the Lavender farm and bring you to the herb soap making and red wine classes. However, the best part is that, we'll all have a bottle of red wine at the end! Wanna have a different one-day tour? Just come and join us!
strTitle: Experience in Sanmeoru Farm+Lavender Garden+Yeoju Premium Outlets one-day tour

strIntroduction: 想要對韓國有更深的認識嗎？最能感受當地文化的旅遊方式－環韓巴士K-Shuttle。誰說光觀巴士只能走馬看花？穿越首爾、忠清道、全羅道、慶尚道以及全州的＂韓國走透透＂。上車吧！一同領略西海岸的人文及自然風光！
strLocation: Korea, Jeonju, Gyeongnam, Gyeongbuk, Chungnam, Chungbuk, Jeonnam, Jeonbuk, Seoul, Busan

strIntroduction: 現在就把興趣當職業！近年來韓國代購蔚為流行，KKday隆重推出批貨一對一教學課程！過程由韓國專業採購陪同，教您最省成本的小秘訣和殺價技巧，還能針對旅客想採購的類型量身訂做最適合您的課程唷！

strIntroduction: After graduating from Taiwan, Yuan Oppa went back to Korea in 2014 opening travel agencies. Every Winter, Yuan Oppa ski school offers professional skiing lectures, which Yuan Oppa teaches in person! Have you figured out what to do this winter? Let's join Yuan Oppa skiing class and have a unforgettable memory!
strTitle: Yuan Oppa Skiing Groups in Korea (Class in English)

strIntroduction: 擁有南海美景與南國風情的統營，位於慶尚南道巨濟至全羅南道麗水間的閑麗海上國立公園的心臟部位，碧綠而清澈的海洋中，有一座「小每勿島」，從90年代起成為韓國人最愛的度假名勝之一，島上無開發破壞的純天然樣貌，形成一幅如詩如畫的美景，因而也有「韓國的拿坡里」的美稱哦！
strTitle: 【大邱出發】韓國人最愛度假勝地，海上仙境般的「小每勿島」

strIntroduction: Strolling on the ginkgo road and wandering in the maple forest are really enjoying!
strTitle: A-san Maple One-day Tour

strIntroduction: Breath-taking scenes of Mt. Naejang will never disappoint you!
strTitle: Mt. Naejang Byeonsanbando 2 Days Tour

strIntroduction: Speaking of history and beautiful scenery, you can never forget Gyeongju, the ancient capital of Silla Kingdom!
strTitle: [Depart from Busan] Gyeongju One-day tour

strIntroduction: Are you looking for maple viewing attractions? Mt. Odae can be a new choice! Besides, you can enjoy a romantic afternoon in Seongyojang House!
strTitle: Gangwondo 1 Day Tour

strIntroduction: 曾於2012年舉辦世界博覽會的麗水，擁有秀麗的山水風光，其中最具代表性的麗水鐵道自行車，吹著海風，全程欣賞無敵海景，絕對是視覺上的一大饗宴！
strTitle: 【大邱出發】順天灣庭園＋麗水鐵道自行車＋梧桐島一日遊

strIntroduction: 馬西搜優！首爾新風潮都市療愈系餐廳Caffe Mov使用新鮮的材料製作，讓您品嘗來自自營農場的有機蔬菜做成的絕妙料理！在這個講求健康飲食的時代，位於韓國最繁華地段江南瑞草區蠶院洞的Caffe Mov，絕是您會想一來再來的餐廳喔！

strIntroduction: Having no idea what to do in Jeju? Here's a longest submarine ride in Korea taking you down to 30 meter under the sea level to explore the gorgeous world! If you were person falling for amazing scene, never ever miss this memorable tour!
strTitle: Things to do in Jeju Island: Jeju Cattle Island Submarine Tour

strIntroduction: 夏日炎炎，最享受的就是一家大小一起去溪邊踏踏，享受溪水的沁涼了！到了韓國當然不能錯過最近蔚為流行的農村體驗啦，快跟著KKday到鄉下走一趟，自然農莊體驗、溪上抓魚、乘坐木筏及乘坐水陸兩用車，一窺韓國最淳樸的樣貌！
strTitle: 【一起FUN假趣】 韓國風之村農村體驗，自己吃的魚自己抓！

strIntroduction: Visiting the most beautiful village and taking exciting facilities in Onemount water park will definitely be great memory for both children and adults!

strIntroduction: 韓國最大型的觀光郵輪「美男號」帶你暢遊麗水、順天山水風光！麗水市風景秀麗，2012年曾舉辦世界博覽會而一躍成為世界級觀光勝地，搭著美男號沿著韓國全羅南道海邊，來場畢生難忘的奢華之旅吧！
strTitle: 【大邱出發】韓國最大郵輪！暢遊麗水、順天海景風光

strIntroduction: As its name 'Seorak' meaning the snow would not melt for a long time keeping the rocks in a permanent state of white, Seoraksan Mt. not only has abundant species, but breath-taking scenery. If you're now scheduling your Autumn trip, the must-go maple-seeing spot, Seoraksan Mt. will surely satisfied you!
strTitle: Korea Maple Tour: An Autumn day in Seoraksan Mountain National Park

strIntroduction: Are you still wondering where to go in your Korea trip? A two-day tour not only brings you to those well-known spots, such as Herb Island and Edelweiss Swiss Park in the suburban, but introduce delicious dishes of Korea to you!

strIntroduction: Korean set is undoubtedly the first thing bumping into our mind when it comes to the representation of Korean traditional dishes. Besides the most delicious and authentic Korean dishes, we also offer free hanbok(Korea traditional clothes) experience!

strIntroduction: Owing to Korean drama, 'My Love from the Star', 'chi mei', known as the combination of chicken and mei ju(beer in Korean), has become so well-known! If you wanna try the latest and most popular dishes in Korea, you must never miss SAI!

strIntroduction: 來韓國要吃什麼？當然是最道地的韓定食料理呀！韓定食的第一把交椅，廣受歡迎的人氣餐廳－津津罷漏，享用美食前還無須排隊，想吃就吃！跟著KKDay一起來感受充滿韓國文化的人氣NO.1韓定食料理吧！

strIntroduction: 總是幻想身處於浪漫的韓劇場景嗎？那麼千頌伊與都教授約會的首爾知名地標＂南山首爾塔＂絕對是你不可以錯過的景點。讓夜景搜查團帶你前往南山塔及漢江搭乘＂漢江遊覽船＂，一起發掘首爾的魅力吧！

strIntroduction: 夜晚的首爾除了廣為人知的南山塔、盤浦大橋等夜景排行榜前五名一定要去之外，你知道還有哪些地方也是必去必看的嗎？韓國味十足的傳統市場－廣藏市場，在東大門、清溪川走馬看花，4個小時的夜間首爾尋寶趣等你一起 let's go！

If you're searching for a authentic rice-cake experience, you must pay a visit to this restaurant recommending by the locals!
strTitle: Korea Traditional Dishes, Rice Cake: Red Sun Myeongdong Store

strIntroduction: 來韓國追楓，千萬不要錯過韓國的第一楓葉山－內藏山。內藏山的路段平坦,步道也十分完善，非常適合闔家前往。每年秋天皆能吸引大批遊客來此一睹內藏山楓葉美景。此外，再帶你大芚山搭乘登山纜車前往金剛排雲橋，俯瞰大芚山包圍在雲霧間的秋季景色，留下今秋最美好的回憶。
strTitle: 【秋季名山賞楓限定】內藏山＋大芚山公園兩天楓葉深度遊

strIntroduction: Besides being the host of 2018 Winter Olympic Games, Phoenix Park's a good place to experience various indoor and outdoor facilities! If you're now planning a Winter trip, don't miss the early bird discount to explore this amazing white kingdom!
strTitle: Early Bird Special! One Day Ski Tour to Phoenix Park Ski Resort

strIntroduction: Do you want to dress like your favorite idols? Do you want to enjoy the same service as your favorite idols? Now, it's not a dream anymore! Come and experience in SMTOWN Studio!
strTitle: SMTOWN Studio Photo Shooting

strIntroduction: 想替這次濟州島的旅遊添加點特別的嗎？不同於一般的公演演出，表演者運用專屬於濟州島的神奇魔法準備將觀眾帶進夢幻的世界裡。「笑」果十足的滑稽魔術秀，絕對讓你笑到忘我、平時累積的壓力通通被丟掉！
strTitle: 【讓人捧腹大笑的魔術秀？】韓國濟州島 喜劇魔術秀門票

strIntroduction: There's no man and boy can escape! Seoul Figure Museum W, paradise for anime fans, where everything that should be here is here! You can meet from batman, one piece, transformers to all the other heroes you've known over here. Are you now scheduling for Korea's trip? Don't forget the Figure Museum!
strTitle: Other spots to go in Seoul: Seoul Figure Museum W

strIntroduction: Are you still fascinated with "Descendant Of The Sun"? If you want to experience the feeling of dating with Captain Liu, just come and visit these filming spot with us!
strTitle: [Date with Captain Liu] Descendant Of The Sun Filming Spot Tour

strIntroduction: Although relatively unpopular, it’s one of Korea’s most scenic mountain areas. When maple leaves turn the whole mountain red, it's such a splendid scene!
strTitle: Daedunsan 1 Day Tour
